item.title: VIM: help coding in Python with plugins
item.description: In the last blog posts, I talked about Galera Innoptimizer tool I’ve made in Python. As a VIM lover, I’ve wrote it with that editor and installed additional them with Vundle. Here are the one I’m using (to my .vimrc file): " Python completion Plugin 'klen/python-mode' " Tabular Plugin 'godlygeek/tabular' " Git Gutter Plugin 'airblade/vim-gitgutter' Python completion helps to autocomplete some Python functions automatically. Tabular helps on correctly aligning multiple lines and gitguuter helps you with git to see a live gitdiff !
